solution_line_template: Five pounds of beef cost ${cost_per_pound_beef} x {pounds_of_beef} = $<<{cost_per_pound_beef}*{pounds_of_beef}={cost_of_beef}>>{cost_of_beef}.
So Lyra spent a total of ${cost_fried_chicken} + ${cost_of_beef} = $<<{cost_fried_chicken}+{cost_of_beef}={total_spent}>>{total_spent}.
Therefore, ${weekly_budget} - ${total_spent} = $<<{weekly_budget}-{total_spent}={remaining_budget}>>{remaining_budget} is left on her weekly budget.
